patthana14.29:1.1_0: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.29:1.1_1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.29:2.1_1: adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate nava.
